description: Encapsulates error statistics within a top-level `eStats` member.

edgeErrors.description: The total number of reported errors for traffic between edge and client.

edgeFailurePercentage.description: The percentage of error responses for traffic between edge and client.

edgeHits.description: Total number of hits from clients to edge.

originErrors.description: The total number of reported errors for traffic between edge and origin.

originFailurePercentage.description: The percentage of error responses for traffic between edge and origin.

originHits.description: Total number of hits from the edge to origin.
